name: Creamy Cucumber Salad
description: This simple Creamy Cucumber Salad is the quintessential side dish of summer. It's light, fresh, and so quick to prepare!
instructions: To make the dressing, combine the sour cream, lemon juice, sugar, dill, and salt in a bowl. Set the dressing aside. Peel the cucumbers, if desired. Slice the cucumbers and thinly slice the red onions. Combine the cucumber, red onion, and dressing in a large bowl and stir to combine.  Let the salad sit for 5-10 minutes, give it another stir, then serve.
